line_1: A generous heart in kindness glowing,
line_2: An open hand on all bestowing;

line_1: In all their foreign lustre glowing.
But he to the sun warm glowing,
line_2: The wind his storms then fiercely blowing,

line_1: Of some fair form with visage glowing,
line_2: With loosened braids and tresses flowing,

line_1: With the sweet days of youth in our fancies still glowing,
line_2: And the love of old Friends with old Time ever growing!
